title: Homemade Hummus
ingredients: About 2 cups cooked chickpeas (from 3/4 cup dried, or 1 can drained)
2garlic cloves, peeled and pounded to a puree
1/4cup chickpea cooking liquid or water (if needed)
directions: 1. Purée the chickpeas in a food mill, food processor, or blender. Stir in the tahini, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, and salt and mix until smooth. Add some cooking liquid or water to smooth it out if necessary. If you like, stir in the cumin and cayenne.
